search.query: `default_index` | lookup host_lookup.csv host OUTPUT hostname | eval officeNames = if(isnull(hostname),host,hostname) | dedup officeNames | table host, officeNames | sort + host
`default_index` sourcetype="3cx:queuecalls_view" $hosts3$ | dedup q_name | eval q_field = q_name + " (" + q_num +")" | table q_name, q_num, q_field | sort + q_name

`default_index` sourcetype="3cx:queuecalls_view" $hosts3$ $queue1$ | eval Agent = ag_fname + " " + ag_lname | eval AgentE = Agent+" (Ext."+to_dn+")" | dedup Agent | where to_dn!="" AND to_dn!="1000" | Table AgentE | sort + AgentE

`default_index` sourcetype="3cx:agent_logins" $hosts3$ | eval ex = ag_fname+" "+ag_lname | eval Agent = replace("$extNum$"," \(Ext.*","") | where ex = Agent | eval logoutTime = strptime(logouttime, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S%z") | sort - logoutTime | eval LogoutTime = strftime(strptime(logouttime,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S%z"),"%b %d, %Y %I:%M %p") | rename LogoutTime AS "Last time active" | table "Last time active" | head 1

`default_index` sourcetype="3cx:queuecalls_view" $hosts3$ $queue1$ | eval ex = ag_fname+" "+ag_lname | eval Agent = replace("$extNum$"," \(Ext.*","") | where ex = Agent | table q_name, q_num | sort + q_name | dedup q_name | rename q_name AS "Queue Name", q_num AS "Queue Number"
`default_index` sourcetype="3cx:queuecalls_view" $hosts3$ $queue1$ | eval ex = ag_fname+" "+ag_lname | eval Agent = replace("$extNum$"," \(Ext.*","") | where ex = Agent | stats count

`default_index` sourcetype="3cx:queuecalls_view" $hosts3$ $queue1$ | eval ex = ag_fname+" "+ag_lname | eval Agent = replace("$extNum$"," \(Ext.*","") | where ex = Agent AND isserviced = 1 | stats count

`default_index` sourcetype="3cx:queuecalls_view" $hosts3$ $queue1$ | eval ex = ag_fname+" "+ag_lname | eval Agent = replace("$extNum$"," \(Ext.*","") | where ex = Agent AND isserviced = 0 | stats count

`default_index` sourcetype="3cx:queuecalls_view" $hosts3$ $queue1$ | eval ex = ag_fname+" "+ag_lname | eval Agent = replace("$extNum$"," \(Ext.*","") | where ex = Agent AND isserviced = 0 AND reason_failcode = 0 | stats count

`default_index` sourcetype="3cx:queuecalls_view" $hosts3$ $queue1$ | eval ex = ag_fname+" "+ag_lname | eval Agent = replace("$extNum$"," \(Ext.*","") | where ex = Agent | dedup idcallcent_queuecalls | eval Answered = if(isserviced="1","Answered",if(reason_failcode="0","Unanswered","Failed")) | timechart span=$tmspan$ count by Answered | rename q_name as Queue

`default_index` sourcetype="3cx:queuecalls_view" $hosts3$ $queue1$ | eval ex = ag_fname+" "+ag_lname | eval Agent = replace("$extNum$"," \(Ext.*","") | where ex = Agent | timechart span=1h count | eval hour=strftime(_time,"%H") | stats sum(count) as "Call Activity" by hour

`default_index` sourcetype="3cx:queuecalls_view" $hosts3$ $queue1$ | eval ex = ag_fname+" "+ag_lname | eval Agent = replace("$extNum$"," \(Ext.*","") | where ex = Agent AND isserviced=1 | stats avg(tot_ringing_sec) as avgTT | eval avgTT = strftime(avgTT,"00:%M:%S")

`default_index` sourcetype="3cx:queuecalls_view" $hosts3$ $queue1$ | eval ex = ag_fname+" "+ag_lname | eval Agent = replace("$extNum$"," \(Ext.*","") | where ex = Agent AND isserviced = 1 | stats avg(tot_servicing_sec) as avgTT | eval avgTT = strftime(avgTT,"00:%M:%S")

`default_index` sourcetype="3cx:queuecalls_view" $hosts3$ $queue1$ | eval ex = ag_fname+" "+ag_lname | eval Agent = replace("$extNum$"," \(Ext.*","") | where ex = Agent AND isserviced = 1 | stats avg(tot_agent_polling_sec) as avgTT | eval avgTT = strftime(avgTT,"00:%M:%S")

`default_index` sourcetype="3cx:queuecalls_view" $hosts3$ $queue1$ | eval AgentName = ag_fname+" "+ag_lname | eval Ag = replace("$extNum$"," \(Ext.*","") | where AgentName = Ag | eval Status = if(isserviced="1", "Answered Call", if(reason_failcode="0", "Unanswered Call", "Failed Call")) | eval Duration = (tot_locating_sec+tot_polling_sec+tot_ringing_sec+tot_servicing_sec+tot_waiting_sec)*1000 | eval StartTime = strptime(time_start, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S%z") | stats count by StartTime, Duration, AgentName, Status | table StartTime, Status, AgentName, Duration

`default_index` sourcetype="3cx:queuecalls_view" $hosts3$ $queue1$ | eval ex = ag_fname+" "+ag_lname | eval Agent = replace("$extNum$"," \(Ext.*","") | where ex = Agent | eval Outcome = if(isserviced="1","Call was answered","Call was not answered") | eval newtime = if(isnull(time_start) OR time_start = "00:00:00", "00:00:00",time_start) | eval formatTime = strftime(strptime(time_start,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S"),"%b %d, %Y %I:%M:%S %p") | eval RingT = tostring(tot_ringing_sec,"duration") | rex field=RingT "(?<RingTm>.*\.\d)" | eval TalkT = tostring(tot_servicing_sec,"duration") | rex field=TalkT "(?<TalkTm>.*\.\d)" | rename TalkTm as "Talking (s)", RingTm as "Ringing (s)", idcallcent_queuecalls as "Call ID", formatTime as "Time", from_displayname as "From", q_num as "Queue" | table "Call ID", "Time", "From", "Queue", Agent, "Ringing (s)","Talking (s)", Outcome
